comments: The 'Px + 1 map': if x is divisible by any prime less than P then divide out these primes one at a time starting with the smallest; otherwise multiply x by P and add 1. This is similar to A057684, but with P = 5 instead of P = 13. - _Alonso del Arte_, Jul 04 2015
formula: a(0) = 5, a(n) = a(n - 1)/2 if a(n - 1) is even, a(n) = a(n - 1)/3 if a(n - 1) is odd and divisible by 3, a(n) = 5a(n - 1) otherwise.
example: 7 is odd and not divisible by 3, so it's followed by 5 * 7 + 1 = 36.36 is even, so it's followed by 36/2 = 18.18 is even, so it's followed by 18/2 = 9.9 is odd and divisible by 3, so it's followed by 9/3 = 3.
author: _N. J. A. Sloane_, Oct 20 2000
